children.name: Optiyan
children.description: Optiyan is a Tech firm that focuses on operational harmony rather than just software sales. Positioning themselves as "architects of efficiency" they specialize in streamlining workflows and refining business processes to create a more seamless, productive workday.

children.name: Zataarak
children.description: a streamlined, form-based UI for Docker Swarm management that transforms the complexity of container orchestration into an intuitive, accessible experience

children.name: Howling Hood
children.description: Howling Hood is a gaming channel dedicated to moving beyond the screen and building a real community. Rather than just focusing on high scores or highlights, the mission is to cultivate genuine connections and foster a welcoming space for friendly, authentic dialogue with the audience. For Howling Hood, every stream and post is an opportunity to turn viewers into friends and a fanbase into a family.

children.name: Simply Saee
children.description: A female-led gaming channel focused on warmth, relaxation, and community. If you’re looking for a place to decompress and connect with kind-hearted people, head here and you’ve found your home.
